1 // $Id: RangeItem.js 126 2008-03-12 10:19:57Z dandfra $
  2 
  3 Ext.namespace('Ext.ux.netbox.core');
  4 
  5 /** Creates a new RangeItem
  6   * @extends Ext.menu.Adapter
  7   * @constructor
  8   * @param {Object} config Configuration options
  9   * @class This is  private class used by RangeField (it's the contant on the popup)
 10   * @ignore
 11   */
 12 Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeItem = function(config){
 13   this.editorFrom=config.editorFrom;
 14   this.editorTo=config.editorTo;
 15   this.editorFrom.fieldLabel=this.fromText;
 16   this.editorTo.fieldLabel=this.toText;
 17   this.panel= new Ext.Panel({
 18     layout: 'column',
 19     bodyBorder: false,
 20     border: false,
 21     hideBorders: true,
 22     items: [{layout: "form", labelWidth: 28, labelPad: 2, items: [this.editorFrom],columnWidth:0.5},
 23       {layout: "form", labelWidth: 28, labelPad: 2, items: [this.editorTo],columnWidth:0.5}
 24     ]
 25   });
 26   Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeItem.superclass.constructor.apply(this,[this.panel,config]);
 27 }
 28 
 29 Ext.extend(Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeItem,Ext.menu.Adapter,/** @scope Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeItem.prototype */{
 30   /** @ignore*/
 31   fromText : 'from',
 32   /** @ignore*/
 33   toText   : 'to',
 34   /** @ignore*/
 35   itemCls: "x-menu-item",
 36   /** @ignore*/
 37   hideOnClick: false,
 38   /** initComponent
 39     * @ignore
 40     */
 41   initComponent: function(){
 42     this.addEvents({keyup:true});
 43   },
 44   /** doLayout
 45     * @ignore
 46     */
 47   doLayout: function(width){
 48     var fieldWidth=(width/2)-32;
 49     this.editorTo.setWidth(fieldWidth);
 50     this.editorFrom.setWidth(fieldWidth);//label is wider
 51     this.panel.setWidth(width);
 52     this.panel.doLayout();
 53   },
 54   /** onRender
 55     * @ignore
 56     */
 57   onRender: function(container){
 58 
 59     if(this.editorFrom.getValue()==""){
 60       this.editorFrom.setValue("");
 61     }
 62     if(this.editorTo.getValue()==""){
 63       this.editorTo.setValue("");
 64     }
 65 
 66     Ext.ux.netbox.core.RangeItem.superclass.onRender.apply(this, arguments);
 67   },
 68   /** getValueFrom
 69     * @ignore
 70     */
 71   getValueFrom: function(){
 72     return this.editorFrom.getValue();
 73   },
 74   /** getValueTo
 75     * @ignore
 76     */
 77   getValueTo: function(){
 78     return this.editorTo.getValue();
 79   },
 80   /** setValueFrom
 81     * @ignore
 82     */
 83   setValueFrom: function(value){
 84     if(value===""){
 85       this.editorFrom.setRawValue(value);
 86     } else {
 87       this.editorFrom.setValue(value);
 88     }
 89   },
 90   /** setValueTo
 91     * @ignore
 92     */
 93   setValueTo: function(value){
 94      if(value===""){
 95        this.editorTo.setRawValue(value);
 96     } else {
 97       this.editorTo.setValue(value);
 98     }
 99   },
100   /** isValidFrom
101     * @ignore
102     */
103   isValidFrom: function(preventMark){
104     return this.editorFrom.isValid(preventMark);
105   },
106   /** isValidTo
107     * @ignore
108     */
109   isValidTo: function(preventMark){
110     return this.editorTo.isValid(preventMark);
111   },
112   /** It sets as invalid the from and to fields
113     * @private
114     * @param {String} msg The message to show to the user
115     * @ignore
116     */
117   markInvalid: function(msg){
118     this.editorFrom.markInvalid(msg);
119     this.editorTo.markInvalid(msg);
120   },
121   /** It clears the invalid mask from the from and to fields
122     * @private
123     * @ignore
124     */
125   clearInvalidFields: function(){
126     this.editorFrom.clearInvalid();
127     this.editorTo.clearInvalid();
128   }
129 });
